The specifications of that device have been assigned to this entry. Default settings are per '''LevelOne''''s manual. ==Links of Interest== [http://global.level1.com/search.php?modelstr1=WBR&modelstr2=3800&dlsearch.x=20&dlsearch.y=10&submittype=0&stype=1&searchfrom=0 Downloads]
